#include<bits/stdc++.h>
    using namespace std;
    typedef long long ll;
    
    #define max(a, b, c) ((a < b? (a < c? a : c) : (b < c? b : c)))
 
    int main()
    {
        ll t,z,i,j,k,n,m,s,ans;
        scanf("%lld",&t);
        for(z=1;z<=t;z++)
        {
        	ll a,b,c;
        	double p,q,r;
            scanf("%lld%lld%lld",&a,&b,&c);
            p=sqrt((a+b)*(a+b)+c*c);
            q=sqrt((b+c)*(b+c)+a*a);
 
            r=sqrt((a+c)*(a+c)+b*b);
            printf("%.10lf\n",max(p,q,r));
        }
        return 0;
    }
